author: Noah Higgins-Dunn
title: Ford says it will not reopen its plants at the end of March, citing stay-at-home orders
description: Ford said on Tuesday that it will not reopen its plants in North America on March 30 as originally planned because of various stay-at-home orders caused by the coronavirus.
content:
Ford said on Tuesday that it will not reopen its plants in North America on March 30 as originally planned because of various stay-at-home orders caused by the coronavirus.
